quality_assessment: Excellent comprehensive documentation of work distribution features with accurate code references and examples
positive_aspects: Comprehensive mermaid diagram showing the complete data pipeline flow
All documented filter functions (is_null, is_not_null, is_number, is_string, is_bool, is_array, is_object, contains, starts_with, ends_with, length, matches) match the implementation
Correct pipeline order documented: JSONPath → Filter → Sort → Dedup → Offset → Limit (matches process() implementation at lines 128-204)
Both && and AND, || and OR logical operators correctly documented (lines 124-141 in filter.rs)
Nested field access with dot notation accurately described
Null handling behavior correctly documented for deduplication
NULLS FIRST/LAST sort options properly explained
MkDocs Material features used effectively (admonitions, code annotations, tips, warnings)
Multiple real-world example workflows from actual codebase
Clear troubleshooting section with debugging tips
improvement_suggestions: Add cross-reference links to related pages (DLQ, checkpoint-resume, overview) for better navigation
